text: Under Siege is a 1992 American military action thriller movie. It stars Tommy Lee Jones and Steven Seagal, the latter of whom stars as a Navy SEAL. Under Siege received very strong reception by critics: it brought Seagal right into the mainstream. It was released October 9, 1992. It's sequel is the 1995 movie Under Siege 2: Dark Territory also starring Seagal. ==References== Category:1992 action movies Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies set in Hawaii Category:Movies directed by Andrew Davis
title: Under Siege
